label: Michelsen, Verner & James E. O’Hara.  2014. A review of genus-group names in Diptera (Insecta) that J.C. Fabricius  “borrowed” from other dipterists and proposed as new in his systematic works from 1775 to 1805. Zootaxa 3873(1): 73–81.
value: Michelsen, Verner & James E. O’Hara.  2014. A review of genus-group names in Diptera (Insecta) that J.C. Fabricius  “borrowed” from other dipterists and proposed as new in his systematic works from 1775 to 1805. Zootaxa 3873(1): 73–81.
title: A review of genus-group names in Diptera (Insecta) that J.C. Fabricius “borrowed” from other dipterists and proposed as new in his systematic works from 1775 to 1805
